options.key: Passive case finding (Parent came to me)
Active case finding (CHA went to sick child or on routine visit)
I have explained to the caregiver why the child must be moved to the health facility
Yes. I have given the child oral antibiotics (amoxicillin)
No. Oral antibiotics (amoxicillin) were not provided
Yes. I provided the first dose of ACT and Paracetamol
No. I did not provide the first dose of ACT and Paracetamol
Yes. I have given ORS to the child
No. I have not given ORS to the child
I have advised the caregiver to give fluids and continue feeding

values: I have advised the caregiver to keep the child warm

options.key: I have advised the caregiver to keep the child warm
I have advised the caregiver to keep the child cool
Yes. I have completed the 1.3 Community Trigger and Referral Form
No. I have NOT completed the 1.3 Community Trigger and Referral Form
I have attempted and was successful in arranging transport for the child for a referral visit to the facility
I have attempted but was not successful in arranging transport for the child for a referral visit to the facility
Yes, I gave the child an RDT
No, I did not give the child an RDT
Yes, I informed the caregiver and gave child ACT and Paracetamol
No, I did not give the child ACT and Paracetamol
Yes, I informed the caregiver and gave child ORS and Zinc
No, I did not give the child ORS and Zinc
Yes, I advised on malnutrition and will notify my supervisor
No, I did not advise on malnutrition
